creature.new_creature.name: Gravelhide Basilisk
creature.new_creature.visual: A hulking reptilian creature with rocky scales and menacing yellow eyes.
creature.new_creature.description: The Gravelhide Basilisk is known for its petrifying gaze and its ability to blend into stony environments. Its skin is covered in thick, stone-like scales, which serves as a formidable armor.
creature.new_creature.slain: The creature crumbles into rubble, with its once glowing eyes dimming away.
